price: 42. A Al-lah pertenece la soberanía de los cielos y de la tierra. Y todo retornará a Él (el Día de la Resurrección).
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: walillahi mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa-ilā al-lahi al-maṣīru
